t: Psalm 72
Glory and Universality of the Messiah’s Reign
A Psalm of Solomon.
Give*pn the king Your judgments, O God, And*ld Your righteousness to the king’s Son.
He*ld will judge Your people with righteousness, And*ld Your poor with justice.
The*ld mountains will bring peace to the people, And*ld the little hills, by righteousness.
He*ld will bring justice to the poor of the people; He*ld will save the children of the needy, And*ld will break in pieces the oppressor.
They*ln shall fear You As*ld long as the sun and moon endure, Throughout*ld all generations.
He*ld shall come down like rain upon the grass before mowing, Like*ld showers that*i water the earth.
In*ld His days the righteous shall flourish, And*ld abundance of peace, Until*ld the moon is no more.
He*ln shall have dominion also from sea to sea, And*ld from the River to the ends of the earth.
Those*ld who dwell in the wilderness will bow before Him, And*ld His enemies will lick the dust.
The*ld kings of Tarshish and of the isles Will*ld bring presents; The*ld kings of Sheba and Seba Will*ld offer gifts.
Yes,*ld all kings shall fall down before Him; All*ld nations shall serve Him.
For*ln He will deliver the needy when he cries, The*ld poor also, and him*i who has no helper.
He*ld will spare the poor and needy, And*ld will save the souls of the needy.
He*ld will redeem their life from oppression and violence; And*ld precious shall be their blood in His sight.
And*ln He shall live; And*ld the gold of Sheba will be given to Him; Prayer*ld also will be made for Him continually, And*ild daily He shall be praised.
There*ln will be an abundance of grain in the earth, On*ld the top of the mountains; Its*ld fruit shall wave like Lebanon; And*ld those*i of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
His*ln name shall endure forever; His*ld name shall continue as long as the sun. And*ld men*i shall be blessed in Him; All*ld nations shall call Him blessed.
Blessed*ln be*i the Lord*s God, the God of Israel, Who*ld only does wondrous things!
And*ld blessed be*i His glorious name forever! And*ld let the whole earth be filled with*i His glory. Amen*ld and Amen.
The*ln prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
